abstract.para: Slides and code from Benedikt Stefansson's tutorial at SwarmFest '99.

webpage.para: This is the place to look for tutorial material - especially for users new to Swarm. We always appreciate any new tutorial material you have developed that may be useful for the Swarm community.

simplesect.title: Slides from tutorial at the &SFI;'s 2000 Complex Systems Summer School
Slides from tutorial at SwarmFest '99
simplesect.para:
Benedikt Stefansson benedikt@post.com now at CASA Inc., formerly of UCLA, produced some excellent slides for the tutorial that are now available on-line:
Section One
Section Two
Section Three
They are also available as a tarball (which contains both HTML and PowerPoint formats) on the Swarm ftp site:
swarmfest99-tutorial-slides.tar.gz

simplesect.title: Demos to accompany the Swarm tutorial
simplesect.para: There are a number of demos that accompany Benedikt's tutorial, at the ftp site: swarmfest99-demos.tar.gz
Please direct all technical problems, questions or comments regarding these tutorial demos to Benedikt Stefansson benedikt@hvarf.com.

simplesect.title: Website at UCLA
simplesect.para: Benedikt's web site at UCLA http://cce.sscnet.ucla.edu/swarmcourse/ is an excellent starting resource for both questions on the tutorial material, the demo applications and more general modelling issues.
